game.name: USFIV: Complete Shoryuken Pack (2011)
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Ryu, Ken, Gouken, Dan and Akuma are included in this pack. Mix things up with your favorite Shotokan characters!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All alternate costumes for Ryu, Ken, Gouken, Dan and Akuma are included in this pack. Mix things up with your favorite Shotokan characters!
